title: Not receiving daily worlds missions
body: I would like to keep on completing daily worlds missions, but I can't seem to get them. I only received the 2 missions after getting the icon, and now I'm stuck, not receiving daily missions. I have World Icon if that helps.

replies.body: Those Worlds missions are coming out on a weekly basis. You should be getting more missions as Worlds progresses, with them coming out at the same time of the week each week.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BAEUtXPK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-27T05:39:56.343+0000)
>
> Those Worlds missions are coming out on a weekly basis. You should be getting more missions as Worlds progresses, with them coming out at the same time of the week each week.

Thank you
